description: Returns information about the replication instance types that can be created in the specified region.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: EngineVersion
nested_items.description: The version of the replication engine.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceClass
nested_items.description: The compute and memory capacity of the replication instance as defined for the specified replication instance class. For example to specify the instance class dms.c4.large, set this parameter to "dms.c4.large".

nested_items.name: StorageType
nested_items.description: The type of storage used by the replication instance.

nested_items.name: MinAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of storage (in gigabytes) that can be allocated for the replication instance.

nested_items.name: MaxAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The minimum amount of storage (in gigabytes) that can be allocated for the replication instance.

nested_items.name: DefaultAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The default amount of storage (in gigabytes) that is allocated for the replication instance.

nested_items.name: IncludedAllocatedStorage
nested_items.description: The amount of storage (in gigabytes) that is allocated for the replication instance.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZones
nested_items.description: List of Availability Zones for this replication instance.

nested_items.name: ReleaseStatus
nested_items.description: The value returned when the specified EngineVersion of the replication instance is in Beta or test mode. This indicates some features might not work as expected.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.
